tool_description: Finds the most similar objects in the dataset, based on a given set of values and weights.
name: Data Matching Algorithm
title: Data Matching Algorithm

api_list.name: Matching Post
api_list.description: Finds the most similar objects in the dataset, given a set of criteria / variables
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://windex-matchingapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com/Matching"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "windex-matchingapi-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
